sourceString: In what has been described as "the largest quarantine in human history", a cordon sanitaire was announced on 23 January stopping travel in and out of Wuhan, which was extended to a total of 15 cities in Hubei, affecting a total of about 57 million people.
targetString: Mu byasobanuwe nk’"akato k’abantu benshi mu mateka ya muntu", ingamba zo guhagarika ingendo zatangajwe ku ya 23 Mutarama zihagarika ingendo zijya cyangwa ziva muri Wuhan, aho zongerewe zigera mu mijyi 15 yo muri Hubei, bigera ku bantu hafi miriyoni 57.

sourceString: Private vehicle use was banned in the city.
targetString: Imodoka z’abantu ku giti cyabo zarahagaritswe mu mujyi.

sourceString: Chinese New Year (25 January) celebrations were cancelled in many places.
targetString: Ibirori byo kwizihiza umwaka mushya w’Ubushinwa (25 Mutarama) byahagaritswe ahantu henshi.

sourceString: The authorities also announced the construction of a temporary hospital, Huoshenshan Hospital, which was completed in 10 days.
targetString: Abayobozi banatangaje ko hagiye kubakwa ibitaro by’agateganyo bya Huoshenshan, byubatswe mu minsi 10.

sourceString: Another hospital was built afterwards, Leishenshan Hospital, to handle additional patients.
targetString: Ibindi bitaro byarubatswe nyuma y’aho nk’ibitaro bya Leishenshan, kugira ngo byite ku bandi barwayi.

sourceString: In addition to newly constructed hospitals, China also converted 14 other facilities in Wuhan, such as convention centers and stadiums, into temporary hospitals.On 26 January, the government instituted further measures to contain the COVID-19 outbreak, including issuing health declarations for travellers and extending the Spring Festival holiday.
targetString: Usibye ibitaro bishya byubatswe, Ubushinwa bwanahinduye izindi nyubako 14 zo muri Wuhan, nk’inyubako ziberamo inama n’amasitade mo ibitaro by’agateganyo. Ku ya 26 Mutarama, leta yatanze andi mabwiriza yo kurwanya icyorezo cya COVID-19, harimo gutanga amabwiriza y’ubuzima agenewe abakora ingendo no kongera ikiruhuko cy’iserukiramuco (Spring Festival).

sourceString: Universities and schools around the country were also closed.
targetString: Kaminuza n’amashuri mu gihugu na byo byarafunzwe.

sourceString: The regions of Hong Kong and Macau instituted several measures, particularly in regard to schools and universities.
targetString: Uturere twa Hongukongo na Makawu byafashe ingamba zitandukanye; by’umwihariko, izijyanye n’amashuri na kaminuza.

sourceString: Remote working measures were instituted in several Chinese regions.
targetString: Ingamba zo gukora hakoreshejwe iyakure zafashwe mu turere dutandukanye two mu Bushinwa.

sourceString: Travel restrictions were enacted in and outside of Hubei.
targetString: Amabwiriza ahagarika ingendo yatangiye kubahirizwa imbere no hanze ya Hubei.

sourceString: Public transport was modified, and museums throughout China were temporarily closed.
targetString: Gutwara abantu mu buryo rusange byarahinduwe n’inzu ndangamurage zo mu Bushinwa zirafungwa by’agateganyo.

sourceString: Control of public movement was applied in many cities, and it has been estimated that about 760 million people (more than half the population) faced some form of outdoor restriction.After the outbreak entered its global phase in March, Chinese authorities took strict measures to prevent the virus from "importing" from other countries.
targetString: Kugenzura imigendekere y’ingendo rusange byarakozwe mu mijyi myinshi, aho bivugwa ko hafi abantu miriyoni 760 (icya kabiri kirenga cy’abaturage bose) bagiye bahabwa amabwiriza yo kutava mu rugo. Nyuma y’aho icyorezo kimaze kuba rusange muri Werurwe, inzego z’ubuyobozi mu Bushinwa zafashe ingamba zikomeye zo gukumira virusi ngo "itinjira mu gihugu" iturutse mu bindi bihugu.

sourceString: For example, Beijing has imposed a 14-day mandatory quarantine for all international travellers entering the city.On 23 March, mainland China only one case had transmitted domestically in the five days prior, in this instance via a traveller returning to Guangzhou from Istanbul.
targetString: Urugero, Beijing yashyizeho akato gategetswe k’iminsi 14 ku bantu bose bavuye mu mahanga binjira muri uwo mujyi. Ku ya 23 Werurwe, umuntu umwe mu Bushinwa ni we wanduriye imbere mu gihugu mu minsi itanu yari yabanje, yari agarutse i Guangzhou avuye i Istanbul.

sourceString: On 24 March 2020, Chinese Premier Li Keqiang reported that the spread of domestically transmitted cases has been basically blocked and the outbreak has been controlled in China.
targetString: Ku ya 24 Werurwe 2020, Minisitiri w’Intebe w’Ubushinwa, Li Keqiang, yatangaje ko kwanduzanya kw’abantu imbere mu gihugu byakumiriwe, ubu icyorezo kikaba cyararwanyijwe mu Bushinwa.

sourceString: The same day travel restrictions were eased in Hubei, apart from Wuhan, two months after the lockdown was imposed.The Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs announced on 26 March 2020 that entry for visa or residence permit holders would be suspended from 28 March onwards, with no specific details on when this policy will end.
targetString: Uwo munsi amabwiriza yo gukumira ingendo yarorohejwe muri Hubei nyuma y’amezi abiri hashyizweho gahunda ya guma mu rugo ariko muri Wuhan agumishwaho. Tariki ya 26 Werurwe 2020, Minisiteri y’ububanyi n’amahanga yo mu Bushinwa yatangaje ko abinjira bagendeye kuri viza cyangwa uruhushya rwo gutura mu gihugu bihagaritswe guhera tariki ya 28 Werurwe gukomeza, ntihatangwa ibisobanuro byihariye by’igihe aya mabwiriza azarangirira.

sourceString: Those who wish to enter China will have to apply for visas in Chinese embassies or consulates.
targetString: Abifuza kwinjira mu Bushinwa bagomba gusaba viza muri ambasade cyangwa konsira z’Ubushinwa.

sourceString: The Chinese government encouraged businesses and factories to re-open on 30 March, and provided monetary stimulus packages for firms.The State Council declared a day of mourning to begin with a national three-minute moment of silence on 10:00 4 April, coinciding with Qingming Festival, although the central government asked families to pay their respects online in observance of physical distancing as to avoid a renewed COVID-19 outbreak.
targetString: Tariki ya 30 Werurwe; leta y’Ubushinwa yasabye abakora ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi n’inganda kongera gufungura, inatanga inkunga y’amafaranga yo kuzahura ibikorwa by’ibigo by’ubucuruzi. Inteko ya leta yatangaje ko umunsi w’icyunamo uzatangira igihugu cyose gifata iminota itatu yo kwibuka bikaba ku isaha ya 10:00 ku ya 4 Mata, uhurirana n’Iserukiramuco rya Qingming, ni ho leta yasabye imiryango kunamira abapfuye hakoreshejwe interineti mu kwirinda kwegerana no kwirinda ko hongera kwaduka icyorezo cya COVID-19.

sourceString: COVID-19 was confirmed to have spread to South Korea on 20 January 2020 from China.
targetString: Ku ya 20 Mutarama, hemejwe ko COVID-19 yageze muri Koreya y’Epfo ivuye mu Bushinwa.

sourceString: The nation's health agency reported a significant increase in confirmed cases on 20 February, largely attributed to a gathering in Daegu of a new religious movement known as the Shincheonji Church of Jesus.
targetString: Ku ya 20 Gashyantare, Urwego rw’igihugu rw’ubuzima rwatangaje ko hari ubwiyongere bw’abemejwe ko barwaye, ahanini bitewe n’igiterane cyabereye i Daegu cy’idini rishya rizwi nka Shincheonji Church of Jesus.

sourceString: Shincheonji devotees visiting Daegu from Wuhan were suspected to be the origin of the outbreak.
targetString: Abayoboke ba Shincheonji baje gusura Daegu bavuye i Wuhan ni bo baketsweho guteza icyorezo.

sourceString: As of 22 February, among 9,336 followers of the church, 1,261 or about 13% reported symptoms.South Korea declared the highest level of alert on 23 February 2020.
targetString: Kugeza ku ya 22 Gashyantare, mu bayoboke bose b’iryo dini bagera ku 9 336, muri bo 1 261 cyangwa hafi 13% batangaje ko bafite ibimenyetso. ku ya 23 Gashyantare 2020, Koreya y’Epfo yatangaje ko ari wo mubare munini w’abanduye.

sourceString: On 28 February, more than 2,000 confirmed cases were reported in Korea, rising to 3,150 on 29 February.
targetString: Ku ya 28 Gashyantare, abantu barenga 2 000 bemejwe ko banduye muri Koreya, ku ya 29 Gashyantare uwo mubare ugera kuri 3 150.

sourceString: All South Korean military bases were quarantined after tests confirmed that three soldiers were positive for the virus.
targetString: Ibigo bya gisirikare bya Koreya y’Epfo byose byashyizwe mu kato nyuma yo gupima bikemezwa ko abasirikare batatu bafite virusi.

sourceString: Airline schedules were also affected and therefore they were changed.South Korea introduced what was considered the largest and best-organized programme in the world to screen the population for the virus, and isolate any infected people as well as tracing and quarantining those who contacted them.
targetString: Gahunda z’ingendo z’indege na zo zagizweho ingaruka bityo zirahindurwa. Koreya y’Epfo yatangije gahunda yo gupima ubwandu, ifatwa nka gahunda ngari kandi iteguye neza ku isi yose mu gupima abaturage ubwandu bwa virusi, no gukurikirana no gushyira mu kato abahuye n’abanduye.

sourceString: Screening methods included mandatory self-reporting of symptoms by new international arrivals through mobile application, drive-thru testing for the virus with the results available the next day, and increasing testing capability to allow up to 20,000 people to be tested every day.
targetString: Uburyo bwo gupima burimo kwigaragaza igihe ufite ibimenyetso ku baje baturutse mu mahanga binyuze muri porogaramu ya telefone igendanwa, gupima virusi abantu batavuye mu modoka aho ibisubizo biboneka umunsi ukurikiyeho, no kongera ubushobozi bwo gupima kugira ngo hapimwe abantu 20 000 buri munsi.

sourceString: South Korea's programme is considered to be a success in controlling the outbreak despite not quarantining entire cities.The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: Gahunda ya Koreya y’Epfo ifatwa nk’iyagenze neza mu gukumira icyorezo bidasabye ko imijyi yose ishyirwa mu kato. Abaturage ba Koreya y’Epfo babanje kutavuga rumwe ku buryo perezida Moon Jae-in yitwaye mu kurwanya icyorezo.

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.
targetString: Abanyakoreya benshi basinye inyandiko basaba ko Moon aburanishwa kubera ko leta yitwaye nabi mu guhangana n’icyorezo abandi bashimira uko yitwaye mu kurwanya icyorezo.

sourceString: On 23 March, it was reported that South Korea had the lowest one-day case total in four weeks.
targetString: Ku ya 23 Werurwe, hatangajwe ko Koreya y’Epfo yagize umubare muto w’abanduye mu munsi umwe mu byumweru bine byose.

sourceString: On 29 March it was reported that beginning 1 April all new overseas arrivals will be quarantined for two weeks.
targetString: Ku ya 29 Werurwe, hatangajwe ko guhera ku ya 1 Mata abinjira bashya baturutse hanze bagomba kujya mu kato k’ibyumweru bibiri.

sourceString: Per media reports on 1 April, South Korea has received requests for virus testing assistance from 121 different countries.
targetString: Ku ya 1 Mata, hakurikijwe ibyatangajwe n’ibinyamakuru Koreya y’Epfo yasabwe n’ibihugu birenga 121 kubifasha gupima virusi.

sourceString: Iran reported its first confirmed cases of SARS-CoV-2 infections on 19 February in Qom, where, according to the Ministry of Health and Medical Education, two people died later that day.
targetString: Ku ya 18 Gashyantare, Irani yatangaje ko abantu ba mbere byemejwe ko banduye SARS-CoV-2 muri Qom, uwo munsi abantu babiri bakaba barapfuye, hakurikijwe ibyavuzwe na Minisiteri y’ubuzima n’uburezi bw’ubuvuzi.

sourceString: Early measures announced by the government included the cancellation of concerts and other cultural events, sporting events, and Friday prayers, and closures of universities, higher education institutions, and schools.
targetString: Ingamba za mbere zatangajwe na leta harimo guhagarika ibitaramo n’ibindi bikorwa bijyanye n’umuco, imikino, amasengesho yo ku wa gatanu, gufunga za kaminuza, koreje n’ibigo by’amashuri.

sourceString: Iran allocated five trillion rials to combat the virus.
targetString: Irani yatanze tiriyari eshanu z’amariyari yo kurwanya virusi.

sourceString: President Hassan Rouhani said on 26 February 2020 that there were no plans to quarantine areas affected by the outbreak, and only individuals would be quarantined.
targetString: Ku ya 26 Gashyantare 2020, Perezida Hassan Rouhani yavuze ko nta gahunda zihari zo gushyira uturere turimo icyorezo mu kato, ahubwo abanduye ari bo bonyine bakwiye gushyirwa mu kato.

sourceString: Plans to limit travel between cities were announced in March, although heavy traffic between cities ahead of the Persian New Year Nowruz continued.
targetString: Gahunda zo kugabanya ingendo zikorerwa mu mijyi zatangajwe muri Werurwe, nubwo ingendo nyinshi hagati y’imijyi zakomeje mbere yo kwizihiza ubunani bw’umwaka w’abaperise witwa Nowruz.

sourceString: Shia shrines in Qom remained open to pilgrims until 16 March 2020.Iran became a centre of the spread of the virus after China during February.
targetString: Urusengero rwa Shia rwo muri Qom rwakomeje gufungura ku bakora ingendo nyobokamana kugeza tariki ya 16 Werurwe 2020. Muri Gashyantare, Irani yagize umubare munini w’abanduye virusi nyuma y’Ubushinwa.

sourceString: Amidst claims of a cover-up of the extent of the outbreak in Iran, more than ten countries had traced their cases back to Iran by 28 February, indicating that the extent of the outbreak may be more severe than the 388 cases reported by the Iranian government by that date.
targetString: Irani ikomeje kuvugwaho guhisha umubare w’abanduye, aho kugeza tariki ya 28 Gashyantare ibihugu birenga icumi byakurikiranye abanduye bisanga baravuye muri Irani; bikagaragaza ko icyorezo gishobora kuba gikaze cyane kurusha abantu 388 batangajwe ko banduye na leta ya Irani kugeza iyo tariki.

sourceString: The Iranian Parliament was shut down, with 23 of its 290 members reported to have had tested positive for the virus on 3 March.
targetString: Inteko Nshingamategeko ya Irani yahagaritse imirimo, aho 23 muri 290 bayigize bavuzweho kwandura virusi tariki ya 3 Werurwe.

sourceString: On 12 March, the Human Rights Watch urged the Iranian prison authorities to unconditionally release the human rights defenders detained for peaceful dissent, and to also temporarily release all the eligible prisoners.
targetString: Ku ya 12 Werurwe, Umuryango uharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu (HRW) wasabye inzego zishinzwe amagereza muri Irani kurekura nta yandi mananiza abaharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu bafunzwe bazira kutavuga rumwe na leta badakoresheje intwaro ndetse no gufungura by’agateganyo imfungwa zose zibyemerewe.

sourceString: It stated that there is a greater risk of the virus to spread in closed institutions like detention centres, which also lack adequate medical care.
targetString: Ukomeza uvuga ko byateza ibyago byinshi virusi ikwiriye ahantu hato hari abantu benshi nk’amagereza, aho n’ubuvuzi buba butaboneka bihagije.

sourceString: On 15 March, the Iranian government reported 100 deaths in a single day, the most recorded in the country since the outbreak began.
targetString: Ku ya 15 Werurwe, leta ya Irani yatangaje ko abantu 100 bapfuye mu munsi umwe, akaba ari wo mubare munini mu gihugu kuva icyorezo cyatangira.

sourceString: At least 12 sitting or former Iranian politicians and government officials had died from the disease by 17 March.
targetString: 17 Werurwe, abanyapolitiki cyangwa abakozi ba leta bakora cyangwa bahoze bakorera Irani byibuze 12 bishwe n’indwara.

sourceString: By 23 March, Iran was experiencing 50 new cases every hour and one new death every ten minutes due to coronavirus.
targetString: Kugeza ku ya 23 Werurwe, muri Irani habonekaga abanduye bashya 50 buri saha naho umwe agapfa buri minota icumi yishwe na koronavirusi.

sourceString: According to a WHO official, there may be five times more cases in Iran than what is being reported.
targetString: Umukozi wa OMS yatangaje ko bishoboka ko abarwaye muri Irani bikubye gatanu umubare w’abatangazwa.

sourceString: It is also suggested that U.S. sanctions on Iran may be affecting the country's financial ability to respond to the viral outbreak.
targetString: Hanatangajwe ko ibihano Amerika yafatiye Irani bishobora kuba biri kugira ingaruka ku bushobozi bw’ubukungu mu kurwanya icyorezo cya virusi.

sourceString: The UN High Commissioner for Human Rights has demanded economic sanctions to be eased for nations most affected by the pandemic, including Iran.
targetString: Komisiyo y’uburenganzira bwa muntu mu Muryango w’Abibumbye yasabye ko ibihano by’ubukungu byakoroshywa ku bihugu byugarijwe n’icyorezo harimo na Irani.

sourceString: The outbreak was confirmed to have spread to Italy on 31 January, when two Chinese tourists tested positive for SARS-CoV-2 in Rome.
targetString: Ku ya 31 Mutarama, ni bwo byemejwe ko icyorezo cyageze mu Butaliyani ubwo abashinwa babiri ba mukerarugendo bapimwe bakabasangamo virusi ya SARS-CoV-2 i Roma.

sourceString: Cases began to rise sharply, which prompted the Italian government to suspend all flights to and from China and declare a state of emergency.
targetString: Abanduye batangiye kwiyongera ku buryo bukabije, aho byatumye leta y’Ubutaliyani ihagarika ingendo z’indege zose ziva mu Bushinwa maze itangaza ko igihugu kinjiye mu bihe bidasanzwe.

sourceString: An unassociated cluster of COVID-19 cases was later detected, starting with 16 confirmed cases in Lombardy on 21 February.On 22 February, the Council of Ministers announced a new decree-law to contain the outbreak, including quarantining more than 50,000 people from 11 different municipalities in northern Italy.
targetString: Haje gutahurwa abantu batandukanye banduye COVID-19 aho tariki ya 21 Gashyantare, hagaragaye abantu 16 byemejwe ko banduye muri Lombardy. Ku ya 22 Gashyantare, Inama y’abaminisitiri yatangaje itegekoteka rishya ryo kurwanya icyorezo, harimo gushyira mu kato abantu barenga 50 00 bo mu mijyi itandukanye yo mu majyaruguru y’Ubutaliyani.

sourceString: Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte said, "In the outbreak areas, entry and exit will not be provided.
targetString: Minisitiri w’Intebe, Giuseppe Conte, yagize ati: “Birabujijwe kwinjira no gusohoka mu turere turangwamo icyorezo.

sourceString: Suspension of work activities and sports events has already been ordered in those areas."On 4 March, the Italian government ordered the full closure of all schools and universities nationwide as Italy reached 100 deaths.
targetString: Imirimo n’ibikorwa bya siporo byari byamaze gusabwa guhagarikwa muri utwo turere. Ku ya 4 Werurwe, leta y’Ubutaliyani yasabye ko hafungwa amashuri na za kaminuza mu gihugu hose ubwo Ubutaliyani bwari bumaze gupfusha abantu 100.

sourceString: All major sporting events, including Serie A football matches, were to be held behind closed doors until April, but on 9 March, all sport was suspended completely for at least one month.
targetString: Ibikorwa by’imikino byose bikomeye, harimo n’imikino ya shampiyona y’umupira w’amaguru mu Butaliyani, byakinwe nta bafana kugeza muri Mata; ariko ku ya 9 Werurwe, hatangajwe ko ibikorwa byose bya siporo bihagaritswe burundu byibuze mu kwezi kumwe.

sourceString: On 11 March, Prime Minister Conte ordered stoppage of nearly all commercial activity except supermarkets and pharmacies.On 6 March, the Italian College of Anaesthesia, Analgesia, Resuscitation and Intensive Care (SIAARTI) published medical ethics recommendations regarding triage protocols that might be employed.
targetString: Ku ya 11 Werurwe, Minisitiri w’Intebe Conte yasabye ko hahagarikwa hafi ibikorwa byose by’ubucuruzi keretse amaduka y’ibiribwa na farumasi. Ku ya 6 Werurwe, Koleje ya SIAARTI mu Butaliyani yatangaje amabwiriza agenga ubuvuzi ajyanye na porotokore zo gupima zishobora gukoreshwa.

sourceString: On 19 March, Italy overtook China as the country with the most coronavirus-related deaths in the world after reporting 3,405 fatalities from the pandemic.
targetString: Ku ya 19 Werurwe, Ubutaliyani bwarenze ku Bushinwa buba igihugu cyapfushije abantu benshi bishwe na koronavirusi ku isi nyuma yo gutangaza ko hapfuye abantu 3 405 bazize icyorezo.

sourceString: On 22 March, it was reported that Russia had sent nine military planes with medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: Ku ya 22 Werurwe, hatangajwe ko Uburusiya bwohereje indege za gisirikare icyenda zikoreye ibikoresho by’ubuvuzi bigiye mu Butaliyani.

sourceString: As of 5 April, there were 128,948 confirmed cases, 15,887 deaths, and 21,815 recoveries in Italy, with the majority of those cases occurring in the Lombardy region.
targetString: Kugeza ku ya 5 Mata, abantu 128 948 bari bamaze kwemezwa ko banduye, 15 887 bari bamaze gupfa, naho 21 815 bari bamaze gukira mu Butaliyani; abenshi muri bo ari abo mu karere ka Lombardy.

sourceString: A CNN report indicated that the combination of Italy's large elderly population and inability to test all who have the virus to date may be contributing to the high fatality rate.
targetString: Amakuru ya CNN yagaragaje ko kuba Ubutaliyani bufite abaturage bageze mu zabukuru benshi n’ubushobozi buke bwo kutabasha gupima abantu bose bafite virusi kugeza icyo gihe bishobora kuba ari byo byatumye hagaragara igipimo cy’abapfa kinini.

sourceString: The United Kingdom's response to the virus first emerged as one of the most relaxed of the affected countries, and until 18 March 2020, the British government did not impose any form of social distancing or mass quarantine measures on its citizens.
targetString: Ingamba z’Ubwongereza zo kurwanya virusi zabanje kugaragara nk’izoroheje ugereranyije n’ibihugu byose byagaragayemo abanduye; no kugeza tariki ya 18 Werurwe 2020, leta y’Ubwongereza ntiyari yagashyizeho ingamba zo kutegerana cyangwa kuguma mu rugo.

sourceString: As a result, the government received criticism for the perceived lack of pace and intensity in its response to concerns faced by the public.On 16 March, Prime Minister Boris Johnson made an announcement advising against all non-essential travel and social contact, suggesting people work from home where possible and avoid venues such as pubs, restaurants, and theatres.
targetString: Bityo, leta irabinengerwa kuko hatabayeho kwihutisha ibikorwa no gukaza ingamba zo kurwanya icyorezo cyugarije abaturage. Ku ya 16 Werurwe; Minisitiri w’intebe w’Ubwongereza, Boris Johnson, yatangaje ko ingendo zitari ngombwa zose no kwegerena mu bantu bitemewe, asaba abantu gukorera mu rugo aho bishoboka no kwirinda kujya ahahurira abantu benshi nko mu tubari, resitora n’aho berekanira sinema.

sourceString: On 20 March, the government announced that all leisure establishments such as pubs and gyms were to close as soon as possible, and promised to pay up to 80% of workers' wages to a limit of £2,500 per month to prevent unemployment in the crisis.On 23 March, the Prime Minister announced tougher social distancing measures, banning gatherings of more than two people and restricting travel and outdoor activity to that deemed strictly necessary.
targetString: Ku ya 20 Werurwe, leta yatangaje ko aho kwidagadurira hose nko mu tubari, ahakorerwa imyitozo ngororamubiri hagomba gufungwa vuba bishoboka, kandi isezeranya kwishyura kugeza kuri 80% by’umushahara w’abakozi no kutarenza amapawundi 2 500 ku kwezi kugira ngo abantu baticwa n’ubushomeri mu gihe cy’icyorezo. Ku ya 23 Werurwe, Minisitiri w’Intebe yatangaje ko hakajijwe ingamba zo kwirinda kwegerana, abuza guhura kw’abantu barenze babiri, ahagarika ingendo n’ibikorwa bikorerwa hanze hagakorwa gusa ibikenewe cyane.

sourceString: Unlike previous measures, these restrictions were enforceable by police through the issuing of fines and the dispersal of gatherings.
targetString: Izi ngamba zitandukanye n’izari zarafashwe mbere, aho izi zo zubahirizwaga na Polisi harimo guca abantu amande no kwirukana abateranye.

sourceString: Most businesses were ordered to close, with exceptions for businesses deemed "essential", including supermarkets, pharmacies, banks, hardware shops, petrol stations, and garages.
targetString: Ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi byinshi byasabwe gufunga, usibye ibikorwa bifatwa nk’ibiri ngombwa", harimo amasoko y’ibiribwa, farumasi, amabanki, amaduka y’ibikoresho by’ubwubatsi, sitasiyo z’ibikomoka kuri peterori n’amagaraje.

sourceString: On 20 January, the first known case of COVID-19 was confirmed in the Pacific Northwest state of Washington in a man who had returned from Wuhan on 15 January.
targetString: Ku ya 20 Mutarama, umuntu wa mbere uzwiho kuba yaranduye COVID-19 yemejwe mu gace ka Pasifika y’amajyaruguru y’uburengerazuba muri leta ya Washington, akaba yari umugabo wari ugarutse mu gihugu avuye i Wuhan tariki ya 15 Mutarama.

sourceString: The White House Coronavirus Task Force was established on 29 January.
targetString: Tariki ya 29 Mutarama, hashyizweho Itsinda rishinzwe kurwanya koronavirusi rya perezidansi y’Amerika.

sourceString: On 31 January, the Trump administration declared a public health emergency, and placed restrictions on entry for travellers from China.
targetString: Ku ya 31 Mutarama, ubuyobozi bwa Trump bwatangaje ko hari amakuba abangamiye ubuzima rusange, maze bushyiraho amabwiriza yo gukumira abinjira mu gihugu bavuye mu Bushinwa.

sourceString: On 28 January 2020, the Center for Disease Control—the leading public health institute of the U.S. government—announced they had developed their own testing kit.
targetString: Ku ya 28 Mutarama 2020, Ikigo cya CDC gikomeye muri Amerika gishinzwe ubuzima rusange, cyatangaje ko kikoreye ibikoresho byifashishwa mu gupima virusi.

sourceString: Despite doing so, the United States had a slow start in testing, which obscured the true extent of the outbreak at the time.
targetString: Nubwo hakozwe ibyo, Amerika yatangiye gahoro gupima virusi, bikaba bitaragaragaje neza uko icyorezo gihagaze icyo gihe.

sourceString: Testing was marred by defective test kits produced by the federal government in February, a lack of federal government approval for non-government test kits (by academia, companies and hospitals) until the end of February, and restrictive criteria for people to qualify for a test until early March (a doctor's order was required thereafter).
targetString: Gupima virusi byakomwe mu nkokora n’ibikoresho bitakoraga neza byakozwe na leta y’Amerika muri Gashyantare, kuba leta y’Amerika itaremeje ibikoresho bitakozwe na yo (nk’ibyakozwe na za kaminuza, amasosiyete n’ibitaro) kugeza mu mpera za Gashyantare, n’amabwiriza abemerewe gupimwa kugeza mu ntangiriro za Werurwe basabwaga gukurikiza (nyuma y’aho hasabwaga orudonanse ya muganga).

sourceString: By 27 February, The Washington Post reported fewer than 4,000 tests had been conducted in the United States.
targetString: Kugeza ku ya 27 Gashyantare, ikinyamakuru cya The Washington Post cyatangaje ko hapimwe gusa abantu 4 000 muri Amerika.

sourceString: By 13 March, The Atlantic reported that less than 14,000 tests had been conducted.
targetString: Kugeza ku ya 13 Werurwe, ikinyamakuru cya The Atlantic cyatangaje ko hamaze gupimwa gusa abantu 14 000.

sourceString: On 22 March, the Associated Press reported: "Many people who have symptoms and a doctor's order have waited hours or days for a test."After the first death in the United States was reported in Washington state on 29 February, Governor Jay Inslee declared a state of emergency, an action that was soon followed by other states.
targetString: Ku ya 22 Werurwe, ikinyamakuru cya Associated Press cyatangaje ko: "Abantu benshi bafite ibimenyetso na orudonanse ya muganga bategereje amasaha cyangwa iminsi kugira ngo bapimwe”. Nyuma y’aho umuntu wa mbere apfiriye muri Amerika muri Washington tariki ya 29 Gashyantare, Guverineri Jay Inslee yatangaje ibihe bidasanzwe muri leta, izindi leta na zo zihita zibitangaza.

sourceString: Schools in the Seattle area cancelled classes on 3 March, and by mid-March, schools across the country were shutting down.On 6 March 2020, the United States was advised of projections for the impact of the new coronavirus on the country by a group of epidemiologists at Imperial College London.
targetString: Amashuri yo mu gace ka Seattle yahagaritse amasomo tariki ya 3 Werurwe, naho hagati muri Werurwe, amashuri yo mu gihugu yose yarafunze. Ku ya 6 Werurwe 2020, Amerika yagiriwe inama n’itsinda ry’impuguke mu by’ibyorezo ryo muri Imperial College London ku ngaruka koronavirusi nshya yagira ku gihugu.

sourceString: On the same day President Trump signed the Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, which provided $8.3 billion in emergency funding for federal agencies to respond to the outbreak.
targetString: Kuri uwo munsi Perezida Trump yashyize umukono ku Itegeko ryo kurwanya koronavirusi, ryatanze miriyari 8,3 z’amadorali yo gufasha ibikorwa byihutirwa by’ibigo by’Amerika mu kurwanya icyorezo.

sourceString: Corporations imposed employee travel restrictions, cancelled conferences, and encouraged employees to work from home.
targetString: Amasosiyete yahagaritse ingendo z’abakozi, ahagarika inama, anashishikariza abakozi ba yo gukorera mu rugo.

sourceString: Sports events and seasons were cancelled.On 11 March, Trump announced travel restrictions for most of Europe, excluding the United Kingdom, for 30 days, effective 13 March.
targetString: Ibikorwa bya siporo na za shampiyona byarahagaritswe. Ku ya 11 Werurwe, Trump yatangaje ko ahagaritse ingendo ziva mu Burayi, hatarimo Ubwongereza mu minsi 30 bigatangira ku ya 13 Werurwe.

sourceString: The following day, he expanded the restrictions to include the United Kingdom and Ireland.
targetString: Umunsi wakurikiyeho, mu bihugu bibujijwe yongeyeho Ubwongereza na Irelande.

sourceString: On 13 March, he declared a national emergency, which made federal funds available to respond to the crisis.
targetString: Ku ya 13 Werurwe, yatangaje ko igihugu kiri mu bihe bidasanzwe, byatumye haboneka inkunga y’Amerika mu kurwanya icyorezo.

sourceString: Beginning on 15 March, many businesses closed or reduced hours throughout the U.S. to try to reduce the spread of the virus.
targetString: Guhera ku ya 15 Werurwe, ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi byinshi byarafunze cyangwa bigabanya amasaha y’akazi muri Amerika yose mu rwego rwo kugabanya ikwirakwira rya virusi.

sourceString: By 17 March, the epidemic had been confirmed in all 50 states and in the District of Columbia.On 23 March, it was reported that New York City had 10,700 cases of the coronavirus, more than the total number of cases in South Korea.
targetString: Kugeza ku ya 17 Werurwe, hari hamaze kwemezwa ko icyerezo cyageze muri leta zose uko ari 50 n’Akarere ka Columbia. Ku ya 23 Werurwe, hatangajwe ko umujyi wa New York wari ufite abantu 10 700 banduye koronavirusi, baruta abanduye bose muri Koreya y’Epfo.

sourceString: On 25 March, the governor said that social distancing seemed to be working, as estimates of case doubling slowed from 2.0 days to 4.7 days.
targetString: Ku ya 25 Werurwe, guverineri yavuze ko kwirinda kwegerana bisa nk’aho biri kugenda neza, aho kugira ngo imibare y’abanduye yikube kabiri byasabaga iminsi 2,0 noneho bikaba bisaba iminsi 4,7.

sourceString: As of 28 March, there were 32,308 confirmed cases in New York City, and 672 people had died from the virus.On 26 March, the United States was reported to have more confirmed coronavirus infection cases than any other country in the world, including China and Italy.As of 8 April, 400,335 cases have been confirmed in the United States, and 12,841 people have died.
targetString: Ku ya 28 Werurwe, abantu 32 308 bari bamaze kwemezwa ko banduye mu mujyi wa New York, aho muri bo 672 bishwe na virusi. Ku ya 26 Werurwe, Amerika yatangaje ko ifite abantu banduye koronavirusi kurusha ikindi gihugu cyose cyo ku isi, harimo Ubushinwa n’Ubutaliyani. Kugeza ku ya 8 Mata, hemejwe ko handuye abantu 400 335 muri Amerika, naho abantu 12 841 barapfa.

sourceString: Per media reports on 30 March, U.S. President Trump has decided to extend social distancing guidelines until 30 April.
targetString: Hakurikijwe amakuru tariki ya 30 Werurwe, Perezida w’Amerika Trump yafashe icyemezo cyo kongera amabwiriza yo kwirinda kwegerana kugeza ku ya 30 Mata.

sourceString: On the same day, the USNS Comfort, a hospital ship with about 1000 beds, made anchor in New York.
targetString: Kuri uwo munsi, ubwato bwa USNS Comfort burimo ibitaro n’ibitanda 1000, bwageze ku mwaro w’i New York.

sourceString: On 3 April, the U.S. had a record 884 deaths due to the coronavirus in a 24-hour period.
targetString: Ku ya 3 Mata, muri Amerika hari hamaze gupfa abantu 884 bishwe na koronavirusi mu masaha 24.

sourceString: In the state of New York the cases have exceeded 100,000 people on 3 April.The White House has been criticized for downplaying the threat and controlling the messaging by directing health officials and scientists to coordinate public statements and publications related to the virus with the office of Vice-President Mike Pence.
targetString: Ku ya 3 Mata, muri leta ya New York abanduye bari bamaze kurenga ku 100 000. Perezidansi y’Amerika yanenzwe gupfobya icyorezo no kugenzura ubutumwa butangwa maze igaha amabwiriza abayobozi b’ibigo by’ubuzima n’impuguke mu by’ubuvuzi kugenzura amagambo n’inyandiko bigenewe rubanda n’ibitangazwa n’Ibiro bya Visi Perezida, Mike Pence.

sourceString: Overall approval of Trump's management of the crisis has been polarized along partisan lines.
targetString: Muri rusange, kwemeza uko Trump yitwaye muri iki cyorezo ntibyagiye bivugwaho rumwe n’abamushyigikiye.

sourceString: Some U.S. officials and commentators criticized the U.S. reliance on importation of critical materials, including essential medical supplies, from China.
targetString: Bamwe mu bayobozi b’Amerika n’abanyamakuru bagiye banenga Amerika ku kuba yitabaza gutumiza mu Bushinwa ibikoresho bya ngombwa, harimo ibikoresho by’ubuvuzi by’ibanze.

sourceString: An analysis of air travel patterns was used to map and predict patterns of spread and was published in The Journal of Travel Medicine in mid-January 2020.
targetString: Hasesenguwe ingendo z’indege mu kumenya no guteganya uko icyorezo kizakwirakwira maze bitangazwa mu kinyamakuru cya The Journal of Travel Medicine hagati muri Mutarama 2020.

sourceString: Based on 2018 information from the International Air Transport Association, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo, and Taipei had the largest volume of travellers from Wuhan.
targetString: Hashingiwe ku makuru yo mu 2018 yatanzwe n’Ishyirahamwe ry’ingendo z’indege (IATA), Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo na Taipei byagize umubare munini w’abakora ingendo bava muri Wuhan.

sourceString: Dubai, Sydney, and Melbourne were also reported as popular destinations for people travelling from Wuhan.
targetString: Dubai, Sydney, na Melbourne na byo byavuzweho kuba bikunda gusurwa n’abavuye muri Wuhan.

sourceString: Bali was reported as least able among the 20 most popular destination cities in terms of preparedness, while cities in Australia were considered most able.Australia released its Emergency Response Plan for Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) on 7 February.
targetString: Bali yavuzweho kuba umwe mu mijyi 20 ikunda gusurwa ariko utiteguye neza guhangana n’icyorezo, mu gihe imijyi yo muri Ositaraliya yo yari yiteguye neza. Ku ya 7 Gashyantare, Ositaraliya yatangaje Gahunda yo kurwanya ubwoko bushya bwa koronavirusi (COVID-19).

sourceString: It stated that much was yet to be discovered about COVID-19, and that Australia would emphasize border control and communication in its response to the pandemic.
targetString: Yavuze ko hari byinshi bikwiye gushakishwa ku byerekeye COVID-19, kandi Ositaraliya ikaba igiye kwibanda cyane ku kugenzura imipaka no guhanahana amakuru ku kurwanya icyorezo.

sourceString: On 21 March, a human biosecurity emergency was declared in Australia.
targetString: Ku ya 21 Werurwe, Ositaraliya yatangaje itegeko rigenga kurwanya virusi no kurinda abaturage.

sourceString: Owing to the effective quarantine of public transport in Wuhan and Hubei, several countries have planned to evacuate their citizens and diplomatic staff from the area, primarily through chartered flights of the home nation, with Chinese authorities providing clearance.
targetString: Hakurikijwe umusaruro wavuye mu guhagarika ingendo rusange muri Wuhan muri Hubei, ibihugu byinshi byateganyije gucyura abaturage n’abadiporomate babyo, ahanini hakoreshejwe indege zibacyura mu bihugu byabo, naho inzego z’Ubushinwa zigatanga ibyangombwa bikenewe.

sourceString: Canada, the United States, Japan, India, Sri Lanka, Australia, France, Argentina, Germany, and Thailand were among the first to plan the evacuation of their citizens.
targetString: Kanada, Amerika, Ubuyapani, Ubuhinde, Siri Lanka, Ositaraliya, Ubufaransa, Arijantina, Ubudage na Tayilande biri mu bihugu bya mbere byateguye gucyura abaturage babyo.

sourceString: Pakistan has said that it will not be evacuating any citizens from China.
targetString: Pakisitani yavuze ko itazacyura abaturage bayo bavuye mu Bushinwa.

sourceString: On 7 February, Brazil evacuated 34 Brazilians or family members in addition to four Poles, a Chinese person, and an Indian citizen.
targetString: Ku ya 7 Gashyantare, Burezili yacyuye abanyaburezili 34 cyangwa abagize imiryango biyongera ku banyapolonye bane, umushinwa n’umuhinde.

sourceString: The citizens of Poland, China, and India deplaned in Poland, where the Brazilian plane made a stopover before following its route to Brazil.
targetString: Abaturage ba Polonye, Ubushinwa n’Ubuhinde bahinduriwe indege muri Polonye, aho indege yo muri Burezili yahagaze gato mbere yo gukomeza urugendo igana muri Burezili.

sourceString: Brazilian citizens who went to Wuhan were quarantined at a military base near Brasília.
targetString: Abanyaburezili bagiye muri Wuhan bashyizwe mu kato mu kigo cya gisirikare kiri hafi y’umujyi wa Brasília.

sourceString: On the same day, 215 Canadians (176 from the first plane, and 39 from a second plane chartered by the U.S. government) were evacuated from Wuhan to CFB Trenton to be quarantined for two weeks.
targetString: Kuri uwo munsi, abanyakanada 215 (176 bo mu ndege ya mbere na 39 bo mu ndege ya kabiri yatanzwe na leta y’Amerika) bacyuwe bavuye muri Wuhan bajya i CFB Trenton kugira ngo bashyirwe mu kato k’ibyumweru bibiri.

sourceString: On 11 February, another plane of 185 Canadians from Wuhan landed at CFB Trenton.
targetString: Ku ya 11 Gashyantare, indi ndege itwaye abanyakanada 185 ivuye Wuhan yaguye muri CFB Trenton.

sourceString: Australian authorities evacuated 277 citizens on 3 and 4 February to the Christmas Island Detention Centre, which had been repurposed as a quarantine facility, where they remained for 14 days.
targetString: Ku ya 3 no ku ya 4 Gashyantare, inzego za Ositaraliya zacyuye abaturage 277 zibajyana muri gereza ya Christmas Island, yahinduwemo ahashyirwa abari mu kato, bakahaguma iminsi 14.

sourceString: A New Zealand evacuation flight arrived in Auckland on 5 February; its passengers (including some from Australia and the Pacific) were quarantined at a naval base in Whangaparoa, north of Auckland.
targetString: Indege yari icyuye abasubiye muri Nuveli Zelande yageze ku kibuga cy’indege cya Auckland ku ya 5 Gashyantare; abari bayirimo (harimo n’abaturuka muri Ositaraliya n’ibirwa bya Pasifika) bashyizwe mu kato ku kigo cya gisirikare cya Whangaparoa, mu majyaruguru ya Auckland.

sourceString: On 15 February, the United States announced that it would evacuate Americans aboard the cruise ship Diamond Princess.
targetString: Ku ya 15 Gashyantare, Amerika yatangaje ko izacyura abanyamerika bari mu bwato bwa Diamond Princess.

sourceString: On 21 February, a plane carrying 129 Canadian passengers who had been evacuated from Diamond Princess landed in Trenton, Ontario.
targetString: Ku ya 21 Gashyantare, indege yari itwaye abagenzi b’abanyakanada 129 ibacyuye ibakuye mu bwato bwa Diamond Princess yaguye i Trenton, muri Ontario.

sourceString: In early March, the Indian government began evacuating its citizens from Iran.On 14 March a South African Airways aircraft chartered by the South African Government repatriated 112 South African citizens.
targetString: Mu ntangiriro za Werurwe, leta y’Ubuhinde yatangiye gucyura abaturage bayo ibakuye muri Irani. Ku ya 14 Werurwe, indege y’isosiyete ya South African Airways yatanzwe na leta y’Afurika y’Epfo yacyuye abanyafurika y’Epfo112.

sourceString: Medical screening was performed prior to departure, and four South Africans who were showing signs of coronavirus were left behind to mitigate risk.
targetString: Habanje gukorwa ibizamini byo kwa muganga, aho abanyafurika y’Epfo bane bagaragaje ibimenyetso bya koronavirusi basizwe mu rwego rwo kugabanya ibyago.

sourceString: Only South Africans who tested negative were repatriated.
targetString: Abanyafurika y’Epfo batagaragaje ibimenyetso ni bo bonyine bacyuwe.

sourceString: Test results cleared all the South Africans, including the flight crew, pilots, hotel staff, police and soldiers involved in the humanitarian mission who, as a precautionary measure, all remained under observation and in quarantine for a 14-day period at The Ranch Resort.
targetString: ibisubizo by’ibizamini byagaragaje ko abanyafurika y’Epfo bose, harimo abakozi bo mu ndege, abapirote, abakora muri hoteri n’abasirikare bari mu bikorwa by’ubutabazi bose, mu rwego rwo kwirinda, bakomeje kugenzurwa banashyirwa mu kato k’iminsi 14 mu nyubako ya The Ranch Resort.

sourceString: On 20 March, the United States began to partially withdrawal its troops from Iraq due to the pandemic.
targetString: Ku ya 20 Werurwe, Amerika yatangiye kugarura mu gihugu igice kimwe cy’abasirikare bari muri Irake bitewe n’icyorezo.

sourceString: On 5 February, the Chinese foreign ministry stated that 21 countries (including Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad and Tobago, Egypt, and Iran) had sent aid to China.
targetString: Ku ya 5 Gashyantare, Minisiteri w’ububanyi n’amahanga w’Ubushinwa yavuze ko ibihugu 21 (harimo Belarusi, Pakisitani, Tirinidadi na Tobago, Misiri na Irani) byoherereje imfashanyo Ubushinwa.

sourceString: Some Chinese students at American universities joined together to help send aid to virus-stricken parts of China, with a joint group in the greater Chicago area reportedly managing to send 50,000 N95 masks to hospitals in the Hubei province on 30 January.The humanitarian aid organization Direct Relief, in coordination with FedEx, sent 200,000 face masks along with other personal protective equipment, including gloves and gowns, by emergency airlift to the Wuhan Union Hospital by 30 January.
targetString: Bamwe mu banyeshuri b’abashinwa biga muri kaminuza zo muri Amerika bahuje imbaraga mu gufasha kohereza imfashanyo mu bice by’Ubushinwa byugarijwe n’icyorezo, aho itsinda rigari ryo muri Chicago ryakusanyije udupfukamunwa two mu bwoko bwa N95 tugera ku 50 000 duhabwa ibitaro byo mu ntara ya Hubei tariki ya 30 Mutarama. Umuryango w’ubutabazi wa Direct Relief, ufatanyije na FedEx, wohereje udupfukamunwa 200 000 n’indi myambaro yo kwikingira yabugenewe, harimo uturindantoki n’amakanzu, byajyanywe mu ndege idasanzwe yabijyanye ku bitaro bya Wuhan Union ku ya 30 Mutarama.

sourceString: On 5 February, Bill and Melinda Gates announced a $100 million donation to the WHO to fund vaccine research and treatment efforts along with protecting "at-risk populations in Africa and South Asia".
targetString: Ku ya 5 Gashyantare, Bill na Melinda Gates batangaje ko bahaye inkunga ya miriyoni 100 z’amadorari OMS mu gufasha mu bikorwa byo gukora ubushakashatsi ku rukingo n’umuti ndetse no kurinda "abaturage bafite ibyago byinshi bo muri Afurika na Aziya".

sourceString: Interaksyon reported that the Chinese government donated 200,000 masks to the Philippines on 6 February, after Senator Richard Gordon shipped 3.16 million masks to Wuhan.
targetString: Tereviziyo ya Interaksyon yatangaje ko leta y’Ubushinwa yahaye udupfukamunwa 200 000 Filipine ku itariki ya 6 Gashyantare, nyuma y’aho Senateri Richard Gordon yohereje udupfukamunwa miriyoni 3,16 muri Wuhan.

sourceString: On 19 February, the Singapore Red Cross announced that it would send $2.26 million worth of aid to China.
targetString: Ku ya 19 Gashyantare, Umuryango wa Singapore Red Cross watangaje ko uzohereza imfashanyo ifite agaciro ka miriyoni 2,26 z’amadorari mu Bushinwa.

sourceString: Japan donated one million face masks to Wuhan, Turkey dispatched medical equipment, Russia sent more than 13 tonnes of medical supplies to Wuhan, Malaysia announced a donation of 18 million medical gloves to China, Germany delivered various medical supplies including 10,000 Hazmat suits, and the United States donated 17.8 tons of medical supplies to China and promised an additional $100 million in financial support to affected countries.After cases in China seemed to stabilize, the country has been sending aid to various nations hit by the pandemic.
targetString: Ubuyapani bwatanze miriyoni imwe y’udupfukamunwa muri Wuhan, Turikiya yohereje ibikoresho by’ubuvuzi, Uburusiya bwohereza izindi toni z’ibikoresho by’ubuvuzi muri Wuhan, Maleziya itangaza ko itanze inkunga ya miriyoni 18 z’udupfukamunwa mu Bushinwa, Ubudage bwatanze ibikoresho by’ubuvuzi bitandukanye harimo 10 000 by’imyambaro yo kwikingira yabugenewe naho Amerika itanga toni 17,8 z’ibikoresho by’ubuvuzi mu Bushinwa inasezeranya gutanga izindi miriyoni 100 z’amadorari yo gufasha mu rwego rw’ubukungu ibindi bihugu byahuye n’icyorezo. Umubare w’abandura mu Bushinwa umaze kugabanuka, iki gihugu kikaba kiri kohereza imfashanyo mu bihugu bitandukanye byazahajwe n’icyorezo.

sourceString: In March, China, Cuba and Russia sent medical supplies and experts to help Italy deal with its coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Muri Werurwe, Ubushinwa, Kiba n'Uburusiya byohereje ibikoresho by'ubuvuzi n'inzobere zo gufasha Ubutaliyani guhangana n'icyorezo cya koronavirusi.

sourceString: Businessman Jack Ma sent 1.1 million testing kits, 6 million face masks, and 60,000 protective suits to Addis Ababa, Ethiopia for distribution by the African Union.
targetString: Umunyemari Jack Ma yohereje ibikoresho byo gupima indwara miriyoni 1,1, udupfukamunwa miriyoni 6, ndetse n'imyambaro y'ubwirinzi 60 000 i Addis Abeba, muri Etiyopiya kugira ngo bikwirakwizwe n'Umuryango w'Ubumwe bw'Afurika.

sourceString: He later sent 5,000 testing kits, 100,000 face masks and 5 ventilators to Panama.
targetString: Nyuma yanohereje muri Panama ibikoresho byo gupima indwara 5 000, udupfukamunwa 100 000 n'imashini zifasha guhumeka 5.

sourceString: Ma also donated medical supplies to Canada.The Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Georgia, and the Czech Republic expressed their concerns over Chinese-made masks and test kits.
targetString: Ma yanahaye kandi Kanada ibikoresho by'ubuvuzi. Ubuholandi, Esipanye, Turukiya, Jeworujiya, na Repubulika ya Ceki byagaragaje impungenge zabyo kubera udupfukamunwa n'ibikoresho byo gupima indwara byakorewe mu Bushinwa.

sourceString: For instance, Spain withdrew 58,000 Chinese-made coronavirus testing kits with an accuracy rate of just 30%, meanwhile, the Netherlands recalled 600,000 Chinese face masks which were defective.
targetString: Nk'urugero, Esipanye yahagaritse ikoreshwa ry'ibikoresho 58 000 bipima koronavirusi byakorewe mu Bushinwa byari bifite ubuziranenge ku kigero cya 30%, hagati aho, Ubuholandi bwavanye ku isoko udupfukamunwa 600 000 twakorewe mu Bushinwa kuko twari dufite inenge.

sourceString: Belgium recalled 100,000 unusable masks, thought to be from China, but were in fact from Colombia.
targetString: Ububiligi bwavanye ku isoko udupfukamunwa 100 000 tudashobora gukoreshwa bikekwa ko twavuye mu Bushinwa, ariko mu by'ukuri twaturutse muri Kolombiya.

sourceString: On the other hand, Chinese aid has been well-received in parts of Latin America and Africa.On 2 April, the World Bank launched emergency support operations for developing countries.
targetString: Ku rundi ruhande, imfashanyo zatanzwe n'Ubushinwa zakiriwe neza mu bice by'Amerika y'Epfo n'Afurika. Ku ya 2 Mata, Banki y'Isi yatangije ibikorwa byo gutabara byihutirwa mu bihugu biri mu nzira y'amajyambere.

sourceString: The WHO has commended the efforts of Chinese authorities in managing and containing the epidemic.
targetString: Ishami ry'Umuryango w'Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima ryashimye ibikorwa by'abayobozi b'Ubushinwa mu gucunga no gukumira icyorezo.

sourceString: The WHO noted the contrast between the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak, where Chinese authorities were accused of secrecy that impeded prevention and containment efforts, and the current crisis where the central government "has provided regular updates to avoid panic ahead of Lunar New Year holidays".
targetString: Ishami ry'Umuryango w'Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima ryavuze ko hari itandukaniro hagati y'icyorezo cya SARS cyo mu 2002-2004, aho abayobozi b'Ubushinwa bashinjwaga kukigira ibanga bikabangamira ingamba zo kucyirinda no kugikumira, ndetse n'icyorezo kiriho ubu aho leta "yagiye itanga amakuru ahoraho kugira ngo abantu batagira ubwoba mbere y'ibiruhuko by'Umwaka mushya".

sourceString: On 23 January, in reaction to the central authorities' decision to implement a transportation ban in Wuhan, WHO representative Gauden Galea remarked that while it was "certainly not a recommendation the WHO has made", it was also "a very important indication of the commitment to contain the epidemic in the place where it is most concentrated" and called it "unprecedented in public health history".On 30 January, following confirmation of human-to-human transmission outside China and the increase in the number of cases in other countries, the WHO declared the outbreak a Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC), the sixth PHEIC since the measure was first invoked during the 2009 swine flu pandemic.
targetString: Ku ya 23 Mutarama, nyuma y'icyemezo cy'ubuyobozi bukuru cyo gushyira mu bikorwa icyemezo cyo guhagarika ubwikorezi muri Wuhan, uhagarariye Ishami ry'Umuryango w'Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima, Gauden Galea, yavuze ko nubwo "atari icyifuzo cyatanzwe na OMS ", ko na byo byari "ikimenyetso gikomeye cy'ubushake bwo gukumira iki cyorezo aho kimaze kugaragara cyane" maze acyita "akataraboneka mu mateka y'ubuzima rusange". Ku ya 30 Mutarama, nyuma y'uko hemejwe ko abantu banduza abandi hanze y'Ubushinwa ndetse ko n'imibare y'abanduye ikomeje kwiyongera mu bindi bihugu, Ishami ry'Umuryango w'Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima ryatangaje ko iki cyorezo ari Ikibazo cyihutirwa cy'ubuzima rusange gisaba Ubutabazi Mpuzamahanga (PHEIC), ikibazo nk'iki kikaba ari ubwa gatandatu kibayeho kubera ko ingamba nk'izi zafashwe mu gihe cy'icyorezo cy'ibicurane by'ingurube mu 2009.

sourceString: WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom said that the PHEIC was due to "the risk of global spread, especially to low- and middle-income countries without robust health systems.
targetString: Umuyobozi mukuru w'Ishami ry'Umuryango w'Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima, Tedros Adhanom, yavuze ko PHEIC iterwa n'ibyago byo gukwirakwira ku isi, cyane cyane mu bihugu bikennye n'ibifite ubukungu buciriritse bidafite inzego z'ubuzima zikomeye.

sourceString: In response to the implementations of travel restrictions, Tedros stated that "there is no reason for measures that unnecessarily interfere with international travel and trade" and that the "WHO doesn't recommend limiting trade and movement."
targetString: Mu bijyanye n'ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry'ingamba zo guhagarika ingendo, Tedros yavuze ko "nta mpamvu yo gushyiraho ingamba zitari ngombwa zibangamira urujya n'uruza rw'abantu ndetse n'ubucuruzi" kandi ko "OMS idasaba ko habaho guhagarika ubucuruzi n'ingendo."

sourceString: On 5 February, the WHO appealed to the global community for a $675 million contribution to fund strategic preparedness in low-income countries, citing the urgency to support those countries which "do not have the systems in place to detect people who have contracted the virus, even if it were to emerge".
targetString: Ku ya 5 Gashyantare, OMS yasabye ibihugu gutanga inkunga ingana na miriyoni 675 z'amadorari zo gutera inkunga ingamba zo kwitegura iki cyorezo mu bihugu bikennye, ivuga ko byihutirwa gutera inkunga ibyo bihugu "bidasanzwe bifite gahunda zo gutahura abantu banduye virusi, ndetse n'ubwo yaba izagaragara".

sourceString: Tedros further made statements declaring that "we are only as strong as our weakest link" and urged the international community to "invest today or pay more later".On 11 February, the WHO in a press conference established COVID-19 as the name of the disease.
targetString: Tedros yanatangaje ko "twese twagira imbaraga nk'uko duhuriye ku kugira intege nke" kandi asaba amahanga "gushora imari uyu munsi cyangwa akazishyura byinshi nyuma yaho". Ku ya 11 Gashyantare, mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru, OMS yemeje ko COVID -19 ari ryo zina ry'iyi ndwara.

sourceString: On the same day, Tedros stated that UN Secretary-General António Guterres had agreed to provide the "power of the entire UN system in the response".
targetString: Kuri uwo munsi, Tedros yatangaje ko Umunyamabanga Mukuru w'Umuryango w'Abibumbye António Guterres yemeye gutanga "imbaraga zose z'Umuryango w'Abibumbye mu gushaka igisubizo".

sourceString: A UN Crisis Management Team was activated as a result, allowing coordination of the entire United Nations response, which the WHO states will allow them to "focus on the health response while the other agencies can bring their expertise to bear on the wider social, economic and developmental implications of the outbreak".
targetString: Bityo hashyizweho Itsinda ry'Umuryango w'Abibumbye rishinzwe guhangana n'ibibazo, rigahuza ibikorwa byose by'Umuryango w'Abibumbye, Ishami ry'uwo Muryango ryita ku Buzima rivuga ko bizatuma "bibanda cyane ku butabazi mu rwego rw'ubuzima mu gihe andi mashami ashobora kuzana ubunararibonye bwayo mu guhangana n'ingaruka zatewe n'icyorezo mu rwego rw'imibereho myiza, ubukungu, n'iterambere muri rusange".

sourceString: On 14 February, a WHO-led Joint Mission Team with China was activated to provide international and WHO experts on the ground in China to assist in the domestic management and evaluate "the severity and the transmissibility of the disease" by hosting workshops and meetings with key national-level institutions and to conduct field visits to assess the "impact of response activities at provincial and county levels, including urban and rural settings".On 25 February, the WHO declared that "the world should do more to prepare for a possible coronavirus pandemic," stating that while it was still too early to call it a pandemic, countries should nonetheless be "in a phase of preparedness".
targetString: Ku wa 14 Gashyantare, hashyizweho Itsinda rihuriweho riyobowe na OMS rifatanyije n'Ubushinwa hagamijwe gutoranya inzobere zo ku rwego mpuzamahanga n'iza OMS zoherejwe mu Bushinwa kugira ngo zizabafashe gucunga no kugenzura ibijyanye n'ubukana n'ikwirakwira ry'indwara" hakorwa amahugurwa n'inama n'inzego z'ingenzi mu gihugu no gusura ahantu hatandukanye mu rwego rwo gusuzuma "ingaruka ibikorwa byo kurwanya indwara bishobora kugira ku rwego rw'intara n'uturere harimo n'ibice by'icyaro ndetse n'imijyi." Ku wa 25 Gashyantare, OMS ryatangaje ko "isi ikwiye gukora ibirenzeho mu kwitegura guhangana indwara ya koronavirusi," itangaza ko nubwo hakiri kare mu kuba iyi virusi yakwitwa icyorezo, ibihugu bigomba "gutangira kwitegura".

sourceString: In response to a developing outbreak in Iran, the WHO sent a Joint Mission Team there to assess the situation.On 28 February, WHO officials said that the coronavirus threat assessment at the global level would be raised from "high" to "very high", its highest level of alert and risk assessment.
targetString: Mu rwego rwo guhangana n'icyorezo kigenda cyiyongera muri Irani, OMS yoherejeyo itsinda rihuriweho kugira ngo risuzume uko ibintu bimeze. Ku wa 28 Gashyantare, abayobozi ba OMS bavuze ko isuzuma ry'ubukana bwa koronavirusi ku rwego rw'isi rizazamurwa rikava ku rwego rwo "hejuru" rikagera ku rwego rwo "hejuru cyane", ari na rwo rwego rwayo rwo hejuru rwo kuburira no gusuzuma ingaruka.

sourceString: Mike Ryan, executive director of the WHO's health emergencies program, warned in a statement that "This is a reality check for every government on the planet: Wake up.
targetString: Mike Ryan, umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa ushinzwe gahunda z'ubutabazi za OMS, yaburiye abantu avuga ko "Iki ari igipimo nyakuri kuri buri gihugu cyo ku isi yose: Mukanguke.

sourceString: This virus may be on its way and you need to be ready," urging that the right response measures could help the world avoid "the worst of it".
targetString: Iyi virusi iri kudusatira kandi mugomba kwitegura," ashimangira ko ingamba zihamye zo guhangana na yo zishobora gufasha mu kwirinda "akaga katewe na yo".

sourceString: Ryan further stated that the current data did not warrant public health officials to declare a global pandemic, saying that such a declaration would mean "we're essentially accepting that every human on the planet will be exposed to that virus."
targetString: Ryan yanakomeje avuga ko amakuru yari ariho atigeze atuma abashinzwe ubuzima rusange batangaza ko ari icyorezo cyugarije isi, avuga ko kubitangaza byaba bisobanuye ko "mu by'ukuri twemera ko buri muntu wese ku isi azagerwaho n'iyo virusi."

sourceString: On 11 March, the WHO declared the coronavirus outbreak a pandemic.
targetString: Ku itariki ya 11 Werurwe, OMS yatangaje ko koronavirusi ari icyorezo.

sourceString: The Director-General said that the WHO was "deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity, and by the alarming levels of inaction".The WHO has faced significant criticism for what is seen as inadequate handling of the pandemic, including the late declaration of a public health emergency and the classification of the virus as a pandemic.
targetString: Umuyobozi Mukuru yavuze ko OMS "ihangayikishijwe cyane n'ubwiyongere bw'umuvuduko ukabije ndetse no kutagira ingamba zifatwa". OMS yanenzwe bikomeye ibyagaragaraga nko kutagira ingamba zihamye zo gukumira icyorezo, twavuga nk'itangazo ryavugaga ku bijyanye n'amakuba y'ubuzima rusange no gushyira iyi virusi mu ndwara z'ibyorezo.

sourceString: The backlash included a petition for the WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom to tender his resignation, signed by 733,000 people as of 6 April.
targetString: Mu byamaganwe harimo icyifuzo gisaba ko Umuyobozi Mukuru wa OMS, Tedros Adhanom yegura, kugeza tariki ya 6 Mata, ubu busabe bukaba bwari bumaze gushyirwaho umukono n'abantu 733 000.

sourceString: On 26 March 2020, dozens of UN human rights experts emphasized respecting the rights of every individual during the COVID-19 pandemic.
targetString: Ku ya 26 Werurwe 2020, impuguke z'Umuryango w'Abibumbye zita ku burenganzira bwa muntu zashimangiye kubahiriza uburenganzira bwa buri muntu mu gihe cy'icyorezo cya COVID-19.

sourceString: The expert group stated that everyone is entitled to life-saving interventions and the government holds this responsibility.
targetString: Iri tsinda ry'impuguke ryatangaje ko buri muntu afite uburenganzira ku bikorwa bitabara ubuzima bwe kandi ko ari ishingano ya leta.

sourceString: The group stressed that the lack of resources or health insurance should never serve as a justification for discrimination against a specific group.
targetString: Iri tsinda ryashimangiye ko kubura amikoro cyangwa ubwishingizi bw'ubuzima bitagomba na rimwe kuba impamvu yo kuvangura itsinda ryihariye.

sourceString: The experts underscored that every individual has the right to health, including people with disabilities, belonging to minority groups, older people, internally displaced people, the homeless, those living in extremely poor conditions, people in detention, as well as refugees and other unspecified groups in need of government support.
targetString: Izi mpuguke zashimangiye ko buri muntu afite uburenganzira ku buzima, harimo n'abafite ubumuga, abo mu matsinda ya banyamuke, abantu bakuze, abavuye mu byabo, abatagira aho baba, ababa mu bukene bukabije, abantu bafunzwe, ndetse n'impunzi n'andi matsinda atihariye baba bakeneye ubufasha bwa leta.

sourceString: International governmental organizations are addressing the economic and social impacts of the COVID-19 crisis.
targetString: Imiryango mpuzamahanga ihuriweho na za leta iri gukemura ibibazo by'ubukungu n'imibereho myiza byatewe n'icyorezo cya COVID-19.

sourceString: The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development has launched a platform to provide timely and comprehensive information on policy responses in countries around the world, as well as viewpoints and advice.
targetString: Umuryango w'Ubufatanye mu Bukungu n'Iterambere watangije urubuga rwo gutanga amakuru yuzuye kandi abonekera ku gihe ku bijyanye na politiki zitanga ibisubizo kuri iki kibazo mu bihugu byo ku isi, n'ibitekerezo n'inama binyuranye.

sourceString: From policies to strengthen health systems and the world economy to addressing the effects of lockdown and restrictions on travel, the digital hub includes a Country Policy Tracker, and aims to help countries learn from each other and to facilitate a co-ordinated global response to the coronavirus challenge.
targetString: Uhereye kuri politiki zo kongerera ubushobozi inzego z'ubuzima n'iz'ubukungu ku rwego rw'isi hagamijwe gukumira ingaruka ziterwa na gahunda ya guma mu rugo no kugabanya urujya n'uruza rw'abantu, ingamba zafashwe zishingiye ku ikoranabuhanga zirimo Uburyo bwo gushakisha abahuye n'ubwandu, kandi zigamije no gufasha ibihugu kwigira ku bindi no kubifasha guhuriza hamwe ingamba mpuzamahanga zigamije guhangana na koronavirusi.

sourceString: The Chinese government has been criticized by the United States, UK Minister for the Cabinet Office Michael Gove, and Brazil President Jair Bolsonaro's son Eduardo Bolsonaro for its handling of the pandemic, which began in the Chinese province of Hubei.
targetString: Guverinoma y'Ubushinwa yanenzwe na Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika, Minisitiri w'Ubwongereza ushinzwe Inama y'Abaminisitiri, Michael Gove, na Eduardo Bolsonaro, umuhungu wa Perezida wa Burezile, Jair Bolsonaro, kubera uburyo bwitwaye muri iki cyorezo cyatangiriye mu ntara ya Hubei.

sourceString: A number of provincial-level administrators of the Communist Party of China (CPC) were dismissed over their handling of the quarantine efforts in Central China, a sign of discontent with the political establishment's response to the outbreak in those regions.
targetString: Abayobozi benshi bo ku rwego rw'intara mu Ishyaka rya gikomunisiti ry'Ubushinwa (CPC) birukanwe kubera uko bitwaye mu kibazo cyo gushyira abantu mu kato mu Bushinwa bwo hagati, kikaba ari ikimenyetso cy'uko batishimiye ingamba inzego za politiki zafashe mu rwego rwo kurwanya icyorezo muri utwo turere.

sourceString: Some commentators believe that this move was intended to protect Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping from the public's anger over the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Bamwe mu batanze ibitekerezo bemeza ko iki cyemezo cyari kigamije kurinda Umunyamabanga Mukuru w'Ishyaka rya Gikomunisiti ry'Abashinwa Xi Jinping uburakari bw'abaturage kubera icyorezo cya koronavirusi.

sourceString: Some Chinese officials, e.g. Zhao Lijian rejected an earlier acknowledgement of the coronavirus outbreak starting in Wuhan, in favour of conspiracy theories about the COVID-19 originating from the U.S. or Italy.
targetString: Bamwe mu bayobozi b'Abashinwa, barimo Zhao Lijian banze ko hamenyekana mbere ko icyorezo cya koronavirusi cyatangiriye i Wuhan, bashyigikira inyigisho zo kuyobya uburari zerekeye COVID-19 zikomoka muri Amerika cyangwa mu Butaliyani.

sourceString: The U.S. administration of Donald Trump has referred to the coronavirus as "Chinese virus" or "Wuhan virus" saying that China's "censorship supercharged a virus that has now turned into a global pandemic", which has in turn been criticized by some critics as racism and "distract[ing] from his administration's failure to contain the disease".
targetString: Ubuyobozi bwa Donald Trump muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika bwise koronavirusi "virusi y'Abashinwa" cyangwa "Virusi y'i Wuhan" buvuga ko Ubushinwa bwahishe amakuru bigatuma virusi igira ingufu ziyigira icyorezo mpuzamahanga. Ibi ariko byagawe cyane n'abantu bamwe babifashe nk'ivangura no kurangaza abantu ngo batabona ko ubutegetsi bwe bwagize intege nke mu gukumira icyo cyorezo.

sourceString: The Daily Beast obtained a U.S. government cable outlining a communications stratagem with apparent origins in the National Security Council, with the strategy being quoted as "Everything is about China.
targetString: Urubuga rwitwa "The Daily Beast" rwabonye amakuru ya Guverinoma ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika yerekeye ingamba z'itumanaho bikekwa ko yakomotse mu Kanama gashinzwe Umutekano w'igihugu, aho izo ngamba zavuzweho ko "Zose zerekeye Ubushinwa.

sourceString: We're being told to try and get this messaging out in any way possible, including press conferences and television appearances."Outlets such as Politico, Foreign Policy, and Bloomberg have claimed that China's efforts to send aid to virus-stricken countries is part of a propaganda push for global influence.
targetString: Tubwirwa ko tugomba gukora ibishoboka byose, ubu butumwa tukabukwiza aho ari ho hose nko mu biganiro n'abanyamakuru na za televiziyo. "Ibinyamakuru nka Politico, Foreign Policy, na Bloomberg byagaragaje ko imbaraga Ubushinwa bukoresha bwohereza inkunga mu bindi bihugu ari uburyo bwo kugira ngo bugire ijambo rikomeye ku isi.

sourceString: EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell warned that there is "a geo-political component including a struggle for influence through spinning and the 'politics of generosity'".
targetString: Umuyobozi ushinzwe politiki mpuzamahanga mu Muryango w'Ubumwe bw'Uburayi, Josep Borrell yaburiye abantu avuga ko harimo ikibazo cy'imibanire ya politiki hagati y'ibihugu harimo no kurwanira kuganza ibindi bihugu binyuze mu kwigaragaza neza ndetse 'na politiki y'ubugiraneza'".

sourceString: Borrell also said that "China is aggressively pushing the message that, unlike the US, it is a responsible and reliable partner."
targetString: Borrell yanavuze kandi ko "Ubushinwa bwatanze ubutumwa bweruye ko, bitandukanye na Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika, bwo ari umufatanyabikorwa mwiza kandi wo kwiringirwa."

sourceString: China has also called for the US to lift its sanctions off of Syria, Venezuela and Iran, while reportedly sending aid to the latter two countries.
targetString: Ubushinwa kandi bwasabye ko Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika zikuraho ibihano zafatiye Siriya, Venezuwela na Irani, mu gihe kandi bivugwa ko Ubushinwa bwanohereje inkunga muri Venezuwela na Irani.

sourceString: Jack Ma's donation of 100,000 masks to Cuba was blocked by US sanctions on 3 April.
targetString: Ku ya 3 Mata, impano ya Jack Ma y'udupfukamunwa 100 000 twagombaga kujya muri Kiba twarafatiriwe kubera ibihano bya Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika.

sourceString: US authorities have also been accused of diverting aid meant for other nations to their own country.
targetString: Abayobozi ba Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika barashinjwa kandi kuba barayobereje iwabo inkunga yari igenewe ibindi bihugu.

sourceString: And there have been mask-related disputes reported between other countries, such as Germany, Austria and Switzerland; and the Czech Republic and Italy.
targetString: Hari kandi izindi mpaka zerekeye udupfukamunwa zavutse hagati y'ibindi bihugu; nk'Ubudage, Otirishe n'Ubusuwisi; ndetse no hagati ya Repubulika ya Ceki n'Ubutaliyani.

sourceString: In addition, Turkey seized hundreds of ventilators destined for Spain.
targetString: Na none kandi, Turukiya yafatiriye imashini amagana zifasha guhumeka zari zigiye muri Esipanye.

sourceString: In early March, the Italian government criticized the European Union's lack of solidarity with coronavirus-affected Italy.
targetString: Mu ntangiriro za Werurwe, Leta y'Ubutaliyani yanenze Umuryango w'Ubumwe bw'Uburayi kuba utaragaragarije Ubutaliyani ubufatanye mu gihe bwari buzahajwe na koronavirusi.

sourceString: Maurizio Massari, Italy's ambassador to the EU, said that "Only China responded bilaterally.
targetString: Maurizio Massari, ambasaderi w'Ubutaliyani mu Muryango w'Ubumwe bw'Uburayi yavuze ko "Ubushinwa bwonyine ari bwo bwafashije Ubutaliyani.

sourceString: Certainly, this is not a good sign of European solidarity."
targetString: Mu by'ukuri, ibi si ikimenyetso cyiza cy'ubufatanye bw'Uburayi."

sourceString: On 22 March, after a phone call with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian president Vladimir Putin arranged the Russian army to send military medics, special disinfection vehicles, and other medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: Ku ya 22 Werurwe, nyuma yo kuganira kuri telefoni na Minisitiri w'Intebe w'Ubutaliyani Giuseppe Conte, Perezida w'Uburusiya Vladimir Putin yateguye igisirikare cy'Uburusiya kugira ngo cyohereze mu Butaliyani abasirikare b'abaganga, ibinyabiziga bitera imiti yica udukoko twanduza, n'ibindi bikoresho byo mu buvuzi.

sourceString: Italy's La Stampa newspaper cited an anonymous "high-level political source" that 80 percent of Russia's aid was "useless or of little use to Italy".
targetString: Ikinyamakuru cyo mu Butaliyani cyitwa La Stampa cyifashishije "amakuru gikuye ku muyobozi wo mu rwego rwo hejuru" kitavuze izina avuga ko 80% by'inkunga y'Uburusiya "ari imfabusa cyangwa ntacyo imariye cyane Ubutaliyani".

sourceString: The source accused Russia of embarking on a "geopolitical and diplomatic" charm offensive.
targetString: Uwatanze ayo makuru yashinjaga Uburusiya kuba bushaka gutera "ikibazo cya politiki na dipolomasi" hagati y'ibihugu.

sourceString: The President of Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio dismissed the media reports and expressed their gratitude.
targetString: Perezida wa Lombaridi, Attilio Fontana, na Minisitiri w'Ububanyi n'Amahanga w'Ubutaliyani, Luigi Di Maio, bahakanye ibitangazwa mu itangazamakuru kandi bagaragara bashimira Uburusiya.

sourceString: Russia also sent a cargo plane with medical aid to the United States.
targetString: Uburusiya kandi bwohereje muri Amerika indege itwara imizigo irimo ubufasha bw'ibikoresho byo mu buvuzi.

sourceString: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "when offering assistance to US colleagues, [Putin] assumes that when US manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, they will also be able to reciprocate if necessary."
targetString: Umuvugizi wa Perezidansi y'Uburusiya, Dmitry Peskov, yaravuze ati "iyo Putin atanga ubufasha kuri bagenzi be bo muri Amerika, aba atekereza ko igihe Abanyamerika bakora ibikoresho by'ubuvuzi bagira imbaraga cyane bagatera imbere, na bo bazashobora kudufasha igihe bibaye ngombwa."

sourceString: The planned NATO "Defender 2020" military exercise in Germany, Poland, and the Baltic states, the largest NATO war exercise since the end of the Cold War, will be held on a reduced scale.
targetString: Imyitozo ya gisirikare ya OTAN "Defender 2020" yari iteganijwe mu Budage, Polonye, no mu bihugu bya Balitike, akaba ari yo myitozo y'intambara ikomeye ya OTAN kuva intambara y'ubutita irangiye, izakorwa ku rugero ruto.

sourceString: The Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament's general secretary Kate Hudson criticized the Defender 2020 exercise: "In the current public-health crisis, it jeopardizes the lives not only of the troops from the US and the many European countries participating but the inhabitants of the countries in which they are operating."The Iranian government has been heavily affected by the virus, with around two dozen parliament members infected as well as fifteen other current or former political figures.
targetString: Umunyamabanga Mukuru w'Ubukangurambaga bugamije kurwanya ikoreshwa ry'intwaro za kirimbuzi, Kate Hudson yanenze iyo myitozo ya gisirikare yiswe ‘Defender 2020': "Muri iki kibazo cy'ubuzima rusange turimo, ntikiri gushyira mu kaga ubuzima bw'abasirikare baturuka muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika n'ibindi bihugu byinshi byo mu Burayi gusa ahubwo n'ubw'abaturage batuye mu bihugu abo basirikare bakoreramo." Iyi virusi yibasiye bikomeye leta ya Irani, aho intumwa za rubanda zibarirwa muri makumyabiri n'enye ndetse n'abandi bantu bahoze ari abanyapolitiki bakomeye bayanduye.

sourceString: Iran's President Hassan Rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders asking for help on 14 March 2020, saying that his country is struggling to fight the outbreak due to lack of access to international markets as a result of the United States sanctions against Iran.The outbreak has prompted calls for the United States to adopt social policies common in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and higher levels of funding for public health.
targetString: Tariki ya 14 Werurwe 2020, Perezida wa Irani, Hassan Rouhani, yandikiye ibaruwa rusange abayobozi b'Isi abasaba ubufasha, yavugaga ko igihugu cye gifite ikibazo cyo guhangana n'icyorezo kubera ko kitabasha guhahirana n'amasoko mpuzamahanga bitewe n'ibihano Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika zafatiye Irani. Iki cyorezo cyatumye Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika zisabwa gushyiraho politiki zo guteza imbere imibereho myiza zisanzweho mu bindi bihugu bikize, harimo ubuvuzi rusange, kwita ku bana ku isi hose, ikiruhuko cy'imiryango gihemberwa, ndetse no gutera inkunga ku rwego rwo hejuru ubuzima rusange.

sourceString: Political analysts anticipated it may negatively affect Donald Trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election.Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea worsened due to the pandemic.
targetString: Abasesenguzi mu bya politiki batekereje ko bishobora kugira ingaruka mbi ku mahirwe ya Donald Trump yo kongera gutorwa mu matora ya perezida yo mu 2020. Umubano w'ububanyi n'amahanga hagati y'Ubuyapani na Koreya y'Epfo warushijeho kuba mubi kubera iki cyorezo.

sourceString: South Korea criticized Japan's "ambiguous and passive quarantine efforts" after Japan announced anybody coming from South Korea will be placed in two weeks' quarantine at government-designated sites.
targetString: Koreya y'Epfo yanenze Ubuyapani kubera "imbaraga bwakoresheje mu buryo budasobanutse bushyira abantu mu kato" nyuma y'uko Ubuyapani butangaje ko umuntu wese uzava muri Koreya y'Epfo azashyirwa mu kato mu byumweru bibiri ahantu hashyizweho na guverinoma.

sourceString: The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: Abaturage ba Koreya y'Epfo babanje kutumva kimwe uburyo Perezida Moon Jae-in ari kwitwara muri iki kibazo.

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.The pandemic has allowed countries to pass emergency legislation in response.
targetString: Abanyakoreya benshi bashyize umukono ku cyifuzo basaba ko Moon avanwa ku buyobozi kubera ibyo bavuga ko guverinoma yitwaye nabi mu guhangana n'iki cyorezo, cyangwa bagashimira uko yitwaye. Icyorezo cyatumye ibihugu bitora amategeko yihutirwa kugira ngo bihangane na cyo.

sourceString: Some commentators have expressed concerns that it could allow governments to strengthen their grip on power.
targetString: Bamwe mu batanze ibitekerezo bagaragaje impungenge z'uko bishobora gutuma guverinoma itsimbarara ku butegetsi.

sourceString: In Hungary, its parliament voted to allow the prime minister, Viktor Orbán, to rule by decree indefinitely, suspend parliament as well as elections and punish those deemed to have spread false information about the virus and the government's handling of the crisis.
targetString: Muri Hongiriya, Inteko Ishinga Amategeko yaho yatoye yemerera Minisitiri w'Intebe, Viktor Orbán, gutegeka mu gihe kitazwi, guhagarika Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ndetse n'amatora no guhana abafatwa nk'aho bakwirakwije amakuru y'ibinyoma kuri virusi ndetse n'uburyo guverinoma ikemura iki kibazo.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for several instances of supply shortages, stemming from globally increased usage of equipment to fight the outbreaks, panic buying, and disruption to factory and logistic operations.
targetString: Icyorezo cya koronavirusi cyagiye gitera ingaruka nyinshi z'ibura ry'ibicuruzwa, biturutse ku kuba ku isi hariyongereye ikoreshwa ry'ibikoresho byifashishwa mu kurwanya ibyorezo, ku kuba abantu baraguze byinshi kubera ubwoba, no guhungabana kw'inganda n'ibikorwa byazo.

sourceString: The United States Food and Drug Administration has issued warnings about shortages of drugs and medical equipment due to increased consumer demand and supplier disruption.
targetString: Ikigo gishinzwe imicungire y'Ibiribwa n'Imiti muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika cyatanze umuburo ku bijyanye n'ibura ry'imiti n'ibikoresho by'ubuvuzi kubera ko abaguzi babikeneye biyongereye ndetse n'ihungabana ry'abagemura ibicuruzwa.

sourceString: Several localities also witnessed panic buying that led to shelves being cleared of grocery essentials such as food, toilet paper, and bottled water, inducing supply shortages.
targetString: Mu duce twinshi hagaragaye ko abantu baguze byinshi kubera ubwoba bituma bimwe mu bikoresho by'ingenzi bishira mu maduka nk'ibiribwa, impapuro z'isuku, amazi yo mu macupa, bituma habaho ikibazo cy'ibicuruzwa bike ku isoko.

sourceString: The technology industry in particular has been warning about delays to shipments of electronic goods.
targetString: Inganda z'ikoranabuhanga by'umwihariko zateguje abantu ku byerekeye gutinda mu kohereza ibicuruzwa bya elegitoroniki.

sourceString: According to WHO director-general Tedros Adhanom, the demand for personal protection equipment has risen 100-fold.
targetString: Nk'uko Umuyobozi Mukuru w'Ishami ry'Umuryango w'Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima, Tedros Adhanom, abitangaza, abakeneye ibikoresho byo kwirinda bikubye incuro 100.

sourceString: This demand has led to the increase in prices of up to twenty times the normal price and also induced delays on the supply of medical items for four to six months.
targetString: Ibi byatumye ibiciro bizamuka byikuba incuro zigera kuri makumyabiri ugereranyije n'igiciro gisanzwe kandi binatera ubukererwe ku itangwa ry'ibikoresho by'ubuvuzi buva ku mezi ane kugeza kuri atandatu.

sourceString: It has also caused a shortage of personal protective equipment worldwide, with the WHO warning that this will endanger health workers.
targetString: Byateje kandi ikibazo cy'ibura ry'ibikoresho byo kwirinda ku isi hose, OMS ivuga ko ibi bizashyira mu kaga ubuzima bw'abakozi bo mu rwego rw'ubuzima.

sourceString: In Australia, the pandemic provided a new opportunity for daigou shoppers to sell Australian products into China.
targetString: Muri Ositaraliya, icyorezo cyatanze amahirwe mashya ku bakora ubucuruzi butemewe n'amategeko yo kugurisha mu Bushinwa ibicuruzwa byo muri Ositaraliya.

sourceString: The activity has created a shortage of baby formula in some supermarkets and was subsequently banned by the Australian government.Despite the high prevalence of COVID-19 cases in Northern Italy and the Wuhan region, and the ensuing high demand for food products, both areas have been spared from acute food shortages.
targetString: Iki gikorwa cyatumye habaho igabanuka ry'amata y'abana mu mahahiro amwe n'amwe kandi nyuma yaho Guverinoma ya Ositaraliya yaje kubihagarika.
